sub_title: Ph.D. in Communications Sciences and event and protocol consultant
summary:
An articulate, entrepreneurial and focused events professional with exceptional, innovative, and strategic events, business development and marketing expertise. Passionate, with a commitment to go the extra mile to help clients achieve their goals. A skilled presenter, communicator, relationship manager and strategist with in-depth experience of planning, project and budget management.

Used to working with high profile clients and the delivery of exceptional levels of customer service, quality control and commitment that underscores highly successful events.

Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills and a respectful and collaborative approach to developing successful and sustainable working relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

projects.title: Spoilers de Protocolo
projects.description: Este es un proyecto personal como videobloger en el que voy a explicar el protocolo a través de las series de TV más actuales. Una iniciativa que empiezo con mucho cariño y con el objetivo de que el protocolo NO sea pensar si ponerle peineta a la madrina de la boda o cómo colocar los cubiertos en la mesa.

projects.title: Comunicación Congreso Protocolo UNED 2013: El protocolo y el ceremonial funerario en la primera mitad del s.XX según la obra de Federico García Lorca
projects.description:
Con motivo del Congreso de Protocolo que celebró la Universidad a Distancia UNED, llevamos a cabo esta comunicación en la que hacemos un análisis del protocolo y ceremonial funerario del siglo pasado y su comparativa con el actual. 
Si alguien está interesado en leer la comunicación completa estaremos encantados de mandársela.

profile_positions.location: Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
profile_positions.description:
Successfully re-design and introduce ICT into the “Protocol and Event Management” training program.

New pedagogical innovation successfully designed and executed for this particular training based on: meaningful learning, cooperative, observational and project-based, as well as personal learning space (PLE) and Bloom taxonomy. Results published in the paper: http://comunicacionymetodos.com/index.php/cym/article/view/103/73
profile_positions.title: University instructor and ICT advisor

profile_positions.description:
• Part of a team that delivers outstanding levels of customer care and service, ensuring that best practice is maintained at all times
and KPIs achieved.
• Awarded commendations for receiving excellent customer reviews for three consecutive months.
profile_positions.title: Nike.com Customer Service Specialist - Spanish Speaking Markets

profile_positions.description: M.Ed. Educational Technologies: e-Learning and Knowledge Management professional practices at Jaume I University (Spain). I designed and applied a pedagogical methodology to teach protocol and event organizing through TV shows and Twitter (ICT).
profile_positions.title: Protocol and event organization instructor

profile_positions.description:
Managed a variety of events for a diverse range of clients including Apple, Audi, Seat, Government Departments and Trade Unions.

• Managed and coordinated suppliers, resources, equipment, venues, and materials to ensure the effective and efficient organisation of conferences, meetings, exhibitions and social events.
• Supervised key supplier relationships and contract management, including catering, venues, travel, car hire, hotels, etc., ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations.
• Ensured that events were costed correctly and adhered to budgets.
• Liaised with speakers and VIPS including politicians, members of government and business leaders.
• Coordinated with speakers and VIP guests prior, during and after events, including travel and hotel arrangements.
• Ensured that guests dietary requirements adhered to when organising catering.

Key Events

• Instituto Cervantes (Public Institute that promotes Spanish culture and language) - Managed up to 3 events per month for the client, including protocol, guest lists and invitations, supplier negotiations, contract management and materials to ensure effective and efficient events.
• Audi - Managed launch event activity in 2017, managed a team of 80 people to ensure the relevant impact and smooth running of the events.
• Seat - Managed a team for the launch of the new Seat Ibiza, spent one month training a team of 65 people to be prepared to hit the ground running.
• Trade Union - Organised a conference for 500 attendees over two days that included video presentations, catering, venue management and liaison with speakers.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Events and Protocol Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Within an event organiser department we were able to achieve 2-3 events per month: Foreign Affairs Ministry events, book presentations, press conferences, product presentations, etc.    
•	I was able to manage protocol and event administration: invitations coordination, order of precedence settings, space organisation, suppliers management, etc.
•	For any references ask me for a contact or my recommendation letter
